column1: The brain works like a computer
column2: with multiple networks connecting brain regions that are responsible for different functions. We have complex systems for every function. For example
column3: one brain network is responsible for acquiring and managing the data that comes in from our senses
column4: another is responsible for creating and managing our emotions
column6: and another is responsible for creating
column7: managing and prioritizing our thoughts.In OCD
column8: the communication system between parts of the brain
column9: namely the orbitofrontal cortex and the basal ganglia
column10: is disrupted and the brain makes mistakes when processing and prioritizing information.The orbitofrontal cortex is responsible for using information from the senses to make decisions and anticipating the result of our life choices. In OCD
column11: this region is hyperactivated and detects errors and dangers where there is not anything wrong.
